amendment.description: Amendment requires the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration to prioritize at least $10 million for school bus safety.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to provide funds for school bus safety.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Braley (IA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. Braley (IA).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Braley (IA) amendment (A007) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
